long_description: Quick, efficient, hands-free and easy to use! This cleaning kit doesn't even require you to remove your chain. Features rotating brush design and scrubber pads for fast, thorough cleaning. Clips onto chain and in just 60 seconds, your chain is clean. Use once a month to maximize chain life and enjoy a clean, smooth, and more efficient drivetrain. Includes 4 oz. EcoTech(R) Cleaner and Degreaser Concentrate for up to eight separate cleanings, plus 2 oz. lube.
short_description: Quick, efficient, hands-free and easy to use! This cleaning kit doesn't even require you to remove your chain.
